question: In a certain coded language “VACATIONLAND” is written as “VAACTINOLADN”. How will you write “KAKISTOCRACY” in that same language?
In a coded language, “ACQUIRED” is written as “CAUQRIDE”. Then how “VERBATIM” will be written in the same language?
In a coded language, “GRAPHICS” is written as “ACGHIPRS”. Then how “CHAMPION” will be written in the same language?
In a coded language, “QUALIFY” is written as “AIUFLQY”. Then how “EDUCATOR” will be written in the same language?
In a coded language, “EDUCATION” is written as “UDETACNOI”. Then how “ANECDOTAL” will be written in the same language?
In a coded language, “CREDIT” is written as “TRIEDC”. Then how “ACTIVE” will be written in the same language?
In a coded language, “BROADCAST” is written as “RBDAOTSAC”. Then how “ERADICATE” will be written in the same language?
In a coded language, “GREENHOUSE” is written as “ESUOHNEERG”. Then how “HEMISPHERE” will be written in the same language?
In a coded language, “BACHELORHOOD” is written as “CHORODBAELHO”. Then how “HABILITATION” will be written in the same language?
In a coded language, “FRIENDSHIP” is written as “DFEPRNHSII”. Then how “EVERYTHING” will be written in the same language?
In a coded language, “ADOPT” is written as “NPLKE”. In the same language “BLEND” is written as “RSGDP”. Then, how “PLANE” is written in the same language?
In a coded language, “WALK” is written as “VXZBKMJL”. Then, how “LEAF” is written in the same language?
In a coded language, “LEMAC” is written as “CALF”. Then, how “TAOG” is written in the same language?
solution:
LEMAC in reverse order is CAMEL.

A baby CAMEL is called CALF.

TAOG in reverse order is GOAT.

A baby GOAT is called KID.

In a certain code language, “MARINE” is written as “KSMUCN” and “FACTOR” is written as “XTXFCG”. How is “BACKUP” written in that code language?
In a certain code language, “GUILTY” is written as “MYKCXP” and “KINDLY” is written as “RMOCPH”. How is “NATURE” written in that code language?
In a certain code language, “LATEST” is written as “NNAQYK” and “CASHEW” is written as “QZDPYB”. How is “IGNORE” written in that code language?
If “JUNCTION” is coded as “MTITCMNH”, then how would “NEGATIVE” be coded?
In a certain language, RATE is written as ETAR. How will DESIGN be written in that same code language?
solution:
Logic: The alphabets are written in reverse order.

RATE => ETAR

DESIGN => NGISED
